About me

I'm a Cambridge-based fresh Front-end Developer looking for new opportunities and willing to take on any challenges that help me grow as a professional. My love for the conventional languages lead my career to Cambridge, but that love extended also to the more "tech" languages, and so I have ended up diving into HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React (for starters).
